entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain ending this evening then 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind light except north 40 km/h gusting to 60 over southern sections early this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 17 April 2023
